avalancheActivity.comment: As the temperature drops hardly any more small moist avalanches are possible. In steep terrain there is a danger of falling on the icy crust.

snowpackStructure.comment: The surface of the snow cover is brown due to the effect of the Sahara dust. The surface of the snowpack has frozen to form a strong crust and will hardly soften at all. On shady slopes above approximately 2000 m there are 10 to 50 cm of snow, and even more in some localities. On steep sunny slopes from a snow sport perspective, insufficient snow is lying.

tendency.highlights: Thursday: The danger of dry avalanches will increase a little during the day.
